name: Gone to Seer
description:
A relatively short, "puzzle-shaped" art game about a cryptic, yet familiar Seer...

GO TO THE HOMEPAGE

HINT:  The choice that allowed you to advance from a previous encounter may or may not be the choice that allows you to proceed in the following encounter.

HINT:  Last scene is a title card reading “OOOOOOO OOO OOOOO… etc.”  

 ✿ Known glitch as of 6.30.2022 : If at some point leaving the Glade, the screen is dark but you still hear talking or type noises, just keep clicking. You'll get to the next screen
